   19: 
   20: -module(erl_scan_SUITE).
   21: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   22: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([error_1/1, error_2/1, iso88591/1, otp_7810/1, otp_10302/1,
   26: 	 otp_10990/1, otp_10992/1, otp_11807/1, otp_16480/1, otp_17024/1,
   27:          text_fun/1, triple_quoted_string/1]).
   28: 
   29: -import(lists, [nth/2,flatten/1]).
   30: -import(io_lib, [print/1]).
   31: 
   32: %%
   33: %% Define to run outside of test server
   34: %%
   35: %%-define(STANDALONE,1).
   36: 
   37: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   38: -compile(export_all).
   39: -define(line, put(line, ?LINE), ).
   40: -define(config(A,B),config(A,B)).
   41: -define(t, test_server).
   42: %% config(priv_dir, _) ->
   43: %%     ".";
   44: %% config(data_dir, _) ->
   45: %%     ".".
   46: -else.
   47: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   48: -endif.
   49: 
   50: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   54:     ok.
   55: 
   56: suite() ->
   57:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   58:      {timetrap,{minutes,20}}].
   59: 
   60: all() -> 
   61:     [{group, error}, iso88591, otp_7810, otp_10302, otp_10990, otp_10992,
   62:      otp_11807, otp_16480, otp_17024, text_fun, triple_quoted_string].
   63: 
   64: groups() -> 
   65:     [{error, [], [error_1, error_2]}].
   66: 
   67: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   68:     Config.
   69: 
   70: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   71:     ok.
   72: 
   73: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   74:     Config.
   75: 
   76: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   77:     Config.
   78: 
   79: 
   80: 
   81: %% (OTP-2347)
   82: error_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   83:     {error, _, _} = erl_scan:string("'a"),
   84:     ok.
   85: 
   86: %% Checks that format_error works on the error cases.
   87: error_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   88:     lists:foreach(fun check/1, error_cases()),
   89:     ok.
   90: 
   91: error_cases() ->
   92:     ["'a",
   93:      "\"a",%"
   94:      "'\\",
   95:      "\"\\",%"
   96:      "$",
   97:      "$\\",
   98:      "2.3e",
   99:      "2.3e-",
  100:      "91#9",
  101:      "\"\"\"x",%"
  102:      "\"\"\"\n\"\"",%"
  103:      "\"\"\"\nx\n \"\"\""
  104:     ].
  105: 
  106: assert_type(N, integer) when is_integer(N) ->
  107:     ok;
  108: assert_type(N, atom) when is_atom(N) ->
  109:     ok.
  110: 
  111: check(String) ->
  112:     Error = erl_scan:string(String),
  113:     check_error(Error, erl_scan).
  114: 
  115: %%% (This should be useful for all format_error functions.)
  116: check_error({error, Info, EndLine}, Module0) ->
  117:     {ErrorLine, Module, Desc} = Info,
  118:     true = (Module == Module0),
  119:     assert_type(EndLine, integer),
  120:     assert_type(ErrorLine, integer),
  121:     true = (ErrorLine =< EndLine),
  122:     String = lists:flatten(Module0:format_error(Desc)),
  123:     true = io_lib:printable_list(String).
  124: 
  125: %% Tests the support for ISO-8859-1 i.e Latin-1.
  126: iso88591(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  127:     ok =
  128: 	case catch begin
  129: 		       %% Some atom and variable names
  130: 		       V1s = [$Á,$á,$é,$ë],
  131: 		       V2s = [$N,$ä,$r],
  132: 		       A1s = [$h,$ä,$r],
  133: 		       A2s = [$ö,$r,$e],
  134: 		       %% Test parsing atom and variable characters.
  135: 		       {ok,Ts1,_} = erl_scan_string(V1s ++ " " ++ V2s ++
  136: 							"\327" ++
  137: 							A1s ++ " " ++ A2s),
  138: 		       V1s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(1, Ts1))),
  139: 		       V2s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(2, Ts1))),
  140: 		       A1s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(4, Ts1))),
  141: 		       A2s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(5, Ts1))),
  142: 		       %% Test printing atoms
  143: 		       A1s = flatten(print(element(3, nth(4, Ts1)))),
  144: 		       A2s = flatten(print(element(3, nth(5, Ts1)))),
  145: 		       %% Test parsing and printing strings.
  146: 		       S1 = V1s ++ "\327" ++ A1s ++ "\250" ++ A2s,
  147: 		       S1s = "\"" ++ S1 ++ "\"",
  148: 		       {ok,Ts2,_} = erl_scan_string(S1s),
  149: 		       S1 = element(3, nth(1, Ts2)),
  150: 		       S1s = flatten(print(element(3, nth(1, Ts2)))),
  151: 		       ok				%It all worked
  152: 		   end of
  153: 	    {'EXIT',R} ->				%Something went wrong!
  154: 		{error,R};
  155: 	    ok -> ok				%Aok
  156: 	end.
  157: 
  158: %% OTP-7810. White spaces, comments, and more...
  159: otp_7810(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  160:     ok = reserved_words(),
  161:     ok = atoms(),
  162:     ok = punctuations(),
  163:     ok = comments(),
  164:     ok = errors(),
  165:     ok = integers(),
  166:     ok = base_integers(),
  167:     ok = floats(),
  168:     ok = dots(),
  169:     ok = chars(),
  170:     ok = variables(),
  171:     ok = eof(),
  172:     ok = illegal(),
  173:     ok = crashes(),
  174: 
  175:     ok = options(),
  176:     ok = token_info(),
  177:     ok = column_errors(),
  178:     ok = white_spaces(),
  179: 
  180:     ok = unicode(),
  181: 
  182:     ok = more_chars(),
  183:     ok = more_options(),
  184:     ok = anno_info(),
  185: 
  186:     ok.
  187: 
  188: reserved_words() ->
  189:     L = ['after', 'begin', 'case', 'try', 'cond', 'catch',
  190:          'andalso', 'orelse', 'end', 'fun', 'if', 'let', 'of',
  191:          'receive', 'when', 'bnot', 'not', 'div',
  192:          'rem', 'band', 'and', 'bor', 'bxor', 'bsl', 'bsr',
  193:          'or', 'xor'],
  194:     [begin
  195:          {RW, true} = {RW, erl_scan:reserved_word(RW)},
  196:          S = atom_to_list(RW),
  197:          Ts = [{RW,{1,1}}],
  198:          test_string(S, Ts)
  199:      end || RW <- L],
  200:     ok.
  201: 
  202: 
  203: atoms() ->
  204:     test_string("a
  205:                  b", [{atom,{1,1},a},{atom,{2,18},b}]),
  206:     test_string("'a b'", [{atom,{1,1},'a b'}]),
  207: 		test_string("a", [{atom,{1,1},a}]),
  208: 		test_string("a@2", [{atom,{1,1},a@2}]),
  209: 		test_string([39,65,200,39], [{atom,{1,1},'AÈ'}]),
  210: 		test_string("ärlig östen", [{atom,{1,1},ärlig},{atom,{1,7},östen}]),
  211: 		{ok,[{atom,_,'$a'}],{1,6}} =
  212: 		    erl_scan_string("'$\\a'", {1,1}),
  213: 		test("'$\\a'"),
  214: 		ok.
  215: 
  216: punctuations() ->
  217:     L = ["<<", "<-", "<=", "<", ">>", ">=", ">", "->", "--",
  218:          "-", "++", "+", "=:=", "=/=", "=<", "=>", "==", "=", "/=",
  219:          "/", "||", "|", ":=", "::", ":"],
  220:     %% One token at a time:
  221:     [begin
  222:          W = list_to_atom(S),
  223:          Ts = [{W,{1,1}}],
  224:          test_string(S, Ts)
  225:      end || S <- L],
  226:     Three = ["/=:=", "<=:=", "==:=", ">=:="], % three tokens...
  227:     No = Three ++ L,
  228:     SL0 = [{S1++S2,{-length(S1),S1,S2}} ||
  229:               S1 <- L,
  230:               S2 <- L,
  231:               not lists:member(S1++S2, No)],
  232:     SL = family_list(SL0),
  233:     %% Two tokens. When there are several answers, the one with
  234:     %% the longest first token is chosen:
  235:     %% [the special case "=<<" is among the tested ones]
  236:     [begin
  237:          W1 = list_to_atom(S1),
  238:          W2 = list_to_atom(S2),
  239:          Ts = [{W1,{1,1}},{W2,{1,-L2+1}}],
  240:          test_string(S, Ts)
  241:      end || {S,[{L2,S1,S2}|_]}  <- SL],
  242: 
  243:     PTs1 = [{'!',{1,1}},{'(',{1,2}},{')',{1,3}},{',',{1,4}},{';',{1,5}},
  244:             {'=',{1,6}},{'[',{1,7}},{']',{1,8}},{'{',{1,9}},{'|',{1,10}},
  245:             {'}',{1,11}}],
  246:     test_string("!(),;=[]{|}", PTs1),
  247: 
  248:     PTs2 = [{'#',{1,1}},{'&',{1,2}},{'*',{1,3}},{'+',{1,4}},{'/',{1,5}},
  249:             {':',{1,6}},{'<',{1,7}},{'>',{1,8}},{'?',{1,9}},{'@',{1,10}},
  250:             {'\\',{1,11}},{'^',{1,12}},{'`',{1,13}}],
  251:     test_string("#&*+/:<>?@\\^`", PTs2),
  252: 
  253:     test_string(".. ", [{'..',{1,1}}]),
  254:     test_string("1 .. 2",
  255:                 [{integer,{1,1},1},{'..',{1,3}},{integer,{1,6},2}]),
  256:     test_string("...", [{'...',{1,1}}]),
  257:     ok.
  258: 
  259: comments() ->
  260:     test("a %%\n b"),
  261:     {ok,[],1} = erl_scan_string("%"),
  262:     test("a %%\n b"),
  263:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},{atom,{2,2},b}],{2,3}} =
  264:         erl_scan_string("a %%\n b", {1,1}),
  265:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},{comment,{1,3},"%%"},{atom,{2,2},b}],{2,3}} =
  266:         erl_scan_string("a %%\n b",{1,1}, [return_comments]),
  267:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},
  268:          {white_space,{1,2}," "},
  269:          {white_space,{1,5},"\n "},
  270:          {atom,{2,2},b}],
  271:      {2,3}} =
  272:         erl_scan_string("a %%\n b",{1,1},[return_white_spaces]),
  273:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},
  274:          {white_space,{1,2}," "},
  275:          {comment,{1,3},"%%"},
  276:          {white_space,{1,5},"\n "},
  277:          {atom,{2,2},b}],
  278:      {2,3}} = erl_scan_string("a %%\n b",{1,1},[return]),
  279:     ok.
  280: 
  281: errors() ->
  282:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{string,$',"qa"}},1} = erl_scan:string("'qa"), %'
  283:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{string,$',"qa"}},{1,4}} = %'
  284:         erl_scan:string("'qa", {1,1}, []), %'
  285:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{string,$","str"}},1} = %"
  286:         erl_scan:string("\"str"), %"
  287:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{string,$","str"}},{1,5}} = %"
  288:         erl_scan:string("\"str", {1,1}, []), %"
  289:     {error,{1,erl_scan,char},1} = erl_scan:string("$"),
  290:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,2}} = erl_scan:string("$", {1,1}, []),
  291:     test_string([34,65,200,34], [{string,{1,1},"AÈ"}]),
  292:     test_string("\\", [{'\\',{1,1}}]),
  293:     {'EXIT',_} =
  294:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:string('$\\a', {1,1})}), % type error
  295:     {'EXIT',_} =
  296:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:tokens([], '$\\a', {1,1})}), % type error
  297: 
  298:     "{a,tuple}" = erl_scan:format_error({a,tuple}),
  299:     ok.
  300: 
  301: integers() ->
  302:     [begin
  303:          I = list_to_integer(S),
  304:          Ts = [{integer,{1,1},I}],
  305:          test_string(S, Ts)
  306:      end || S <- [[N] || N <- lists:seq($0, $9)] ++ ["2323","000"] ],
  307:     UnderscoreSamples =
  308:         [{"123_456", 123456},
  309:          {"123_456_789", 123456789},
  310:          {"1_2", 12}],
  311:     lists:foreach(
  312:          fun({S, I}) ->
  313:                  test_string(S, [{integer, {1, 1}, I}])
  314:          end, UnderscoreSamples),
  315:     UnderscoreErrors =
  316:         ["123_",
  317:          "123__",
  318:          "123_456_",
  319:          "123__456",
  320:          "_123",
  321:          "__123"],
  322:     lists:foreach(
  323:       fun(S) ->
  324:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  325:                   {ok, [{integer, _, _}], _} ->
  326:                       error({unexpected_integer, S});
  327:                   _ ->
  328:                       ok
  329:               end
  330:       end, UnderscoreErrors),
  331:     test_string("_123", [{var,{1,1},'_123'}]),
  332:     test_string("123_", [{integer,{1,1},123},{var,{1,4},'_'}]),
  333:     ok.
  334: 
  335: base_integers() ->
  336:     [begin
  337:          B = list_to_integer(BS),
  338:          I = erlang:list_to_integer(S, B),
  339:          Ts = [{integer,{1,1},I}],
  340:          test_string(BS++"#"++S, Ts)
  341:      end || {BS,S} <- [{"2","11"}, {"5","23234"}, {"12","05a"},
  342:                        {"16","abcdef"}, {"16","ABCDEF"}] ],
  343: 
  344:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{base,1}},1} = erl_scan:string("1#000"),
  345:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{base,1}},{1,2}} =
  346:         erl_scan:string("1#000", {1,1}, []),
  347: 
  348:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{base,1}},1} = erl_scan:string("1#000"),
  349:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{base,1000}},{1,6}} =
  350:         erl_scan:string("1_000#000", {1,1}, []),
  351: 
  352:     test_string("12#bc", [{integer,{1,1},11},{atom,{1,5},c}]),
  353: 
  354:     [begin
  355:          Str = BS ++ "#" ++ S,
  356:          E = 2 + length(BS),
  357:          {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,integer}},{1,E}} =
  358:              erl_scan:string(Str, {1,1}, [])
  359:      end || {BS,S} <- [{"3","3"},{"15","f"},{"12","c"},
  360:                        {"1_5","f"},{"1_2","c"}] ],
  361: 
  362:     {ok,[{integer,1,239},{'@',1}],1} = erl_scan_string("16#ef@"),
  363:     {ok,[{integer,{1,1},239},{'@',{1,6}}],{1,7}} =
  364:         erl_scan_string("16#ef@", {1,1}, []),
  365:     {ok,[{integer,{1,1},14},{atom,{1,5},g@}],{1,7}} =
  366:         erl_scan_string("16#eg@", {1,1}, []),
  367: 
  368:     UnderscoreSamples =
  369:         [{"16#1234_ABCD_EF56", 16#1234abcdef56},
  370:          {"2#0011_0101_0011", 2#001101010011},
  371:          {"1_6#123ABC", 16#123abc},
  372:          {"1_6#123_ABC", 16#123abc},
  373:          {"16#abcdef", 16#ABCDEF}],
  374:     lists:foreach(
  375:          fun({S, I}) ->
  376:                  test_string(S, [{integer, {1, 1}, I}])
  377:          end, UnderscoreSamples),
  378:     UnderscoreErrors =
  379:         ["16_#123ABC",
  380:          "16#123_",
  381:          "16#_123",
  382:          "16#ABC_",
  383:          "16#_ABC",
  384:          "2#_0101",
  385:          "1__6#ABC",
  386:          "16#AB__CD"],
  387:     lists:foreach(
  388:       fun(S) ->
  389:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  390:                   {ok, [{integer, _, _}], _} ->
  391:                       error({unexpected_integer, S});
  392:                   _ ->
  393:                       ok
  394:               end
  395:       end, UnderscoreErrors),
  396:     test_string("16#123_", [{integer,{1,1},291},{var,{1,7},'_'}]),
  397:     test_string("_16#ABC", [{var,{1,1},'_16'},{'#',{1,4}},{var,{1,5},'ABC'}]),
  398:     ok.
  399: 
  400: floats() ->
  401:     [begin
  402:          F = list_to_float(FS),
  403:          Ts = [{float,{1,1},F}],
  404:          test_string(FS, Ts)
  405:      end || FS <- ["1.0","001.17","3.31200","1.0e0","1.0E17",
  406:                    "34.21E-18", "17.0E+14"]],
  407:     test_string("1.e2", [{integer,{1,1},1},{'.',{1,2}},{atom,{1,3},e2}]),
  408: 
  409:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1} =
  410:         erl_scan:string("1.0e400"),
  411:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,8}} =
  412:         erl_scan:string("1.0e400", {1,1}, []),
  413:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,9}} =
  414:         erl_scan:string("1.0e4_00", {1,1}, []),
  415:     [begin
  416:          {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1} = erl_scan:string(S),
  417:          {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,_}} =
  418:              erl_scan:string(S, {1,1}, [])
  419:      end || S <- ["1.14Ea"]],
  420: 
  421:     UnderscoreSamples =
  422:         [{"123_456.789", 123456.789},
  423:          {"123.456_789", 123.456789},
  424:          {"1.2_345e10", 1.2345e10},
  425:          {"1.234e1_06", 1.234e106},
  426:          {"12_34.56_78e1_6", 1234.5678e16},
  427:          {"12_34.56_78e-1_8", 1234.5678e-18}],
  428:     lists:foreach(
  429:          fun({S, I}) ->
  430:                  test_string(S, [{float, {1, 1}, I}])
  431:          end, UnderscoreSamples),
  432:     UnderscoreErrors =
  433:         ["123_.456",
  434:          "123._456",
  435:          "123.456_",
  436:          "123._",
  437:          "1._23e10",
  438:          "1.23e_10",
  439:          "1.23e10_"],
  440:     lists:foreach(
  441:       fun(S) ->
  442:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  443:                   {ok, [{float, _, _}], _} ->
  444:                       error({unexpected_float, S});
  445:                   _ ->
  446:                       ok
  447:               end
  448:       end, UnderscoreErrors),
  449:     test_string("123._", [{integer,{1,1},123},{'.',{1,4}},{var,{1,5},'_'}]),
  450:     test_string("1.23_e10", [{float,{1,1},1.23},{var,{1,5},'_e10'}]),
  451:     ok.
  452: 
  453: dots() ->
  454:     Dot = [{".",    {ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,2}}},
  455:            {". ",   {ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,3}}},
  456:            {".\n",  {ok,[{dot,1}],2}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{2,1}}},
  457:            {".%",   {ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,3}}},
  458:            {".\210",{ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,3}}},
  459:            {".% öh",{ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,6}}},
  460:            {".%\n", {ok,[{dot,1}],2}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{2,1}}},
  461:            {".$",   {error,{1,erl_scan,char},1},
  462: 	    {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,char},{1,3}}},
  463:            {".$\\", {error,{1,erl_scan,char},1},
  464:                     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,char},{1,4}}},
  465:            {".a",   {ok,[{'.',1},{atom,1,a}],1},
  466: 	    {ok,[{'.',{1,1}},{atom,{1,2},a}],{1,3}}}
  467:           ],
  468:     [begin
  469:          R = erl_scan_string(S),
  470:          R2 = erl_scan_string(S, {1,1}, [])
  471:      end || {S, R, R2} <- Dot],
  472: 
  473:     {ok,[{dot,_}=T1],{1,2}} = erl_scan:string(".", {1,1}, text),
  474:     [1, 1, "."] = token_info(T1),
  475:     {ok,[{dot,_}=T2],{1,3}} = erl_scan:string(".%", {1,1}, text),
  476:     [1, 1, "."] = token_info(T2),
  477:     {ok,[{dot,_}=T3],{1,6}} =
  478:         erl_scan:string(".% öh", {1,1}, text),
  479:     [1, 1, "."] = token_info(T3),
  480:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,char},{1,3}} = erl_scan:string(".$", {1,1}),
  481:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,char},{1,4}} = erl_scan:string(".$\\", {1,1}),
  482: 
  483:     test_string(". ", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  484:     test_string(".  ", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  485:     test_string(".\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  486:     test_string(".\n\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  487:     test_string(".\n\r", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  488:     test_string(".\n\n\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  489:     test_string(".\210", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  490:     test_string(".%\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  491:     test_string(".a", [{'.',{1,1}},{atom,{1,2},a}]),
  492: 
  493:     test_string("%. \n. ", [{dot,{2,1}}]),
  494:     {more,C} = erl_scan:tokens([], "%. ",{1,1}, return),
  495:     {done,{ok,[{comment,{1,1},"%. "},
  496:                {white_space,{1,4},"\n"},
  497:                {dot,{2,1}}],
  498:            {2,3}}, ""} =
  499:         erl_scan_tokens(C, "\n. ", {1,1}, return), % any loc, any options
  500: 
  501:     [test_string(S, R) ||
  502:         {S, R} <- [{".$\n",   [{'.',{1,1}},{char,{1,2},$\n}]},
  503:                    {"$\\\n",  [{char,{1,1},$\n}]},
  504:                    {"'\\\n'", [{atom,{1,1},'\n'}]},
  505:                    {"$\n",    [{char,{1,1},$\n}]}] ],
  506:     ok.
  507: 
  508: chars() ->
  509:     [begin
  510:          L = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("$\\~.8b", [C])),
  511:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  512:          test_string(L, Ts)
  513:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255)],
  514: 
  515:     %% Leading zeroes...
  516:     [begin
  517:          L = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("$\\~3.8.0b", [C])),
  518:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  519:          test_string(L, Ts)
  520:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255)],
  521: 
  522:     %% GH-6477. Test legal use of caret notation.
  523:     [begin
  524:          L = "$\\^" ++ [C],
  525:          Ts = case C of
  526:                   $? ->
  527:                       [{char,{1,1},127}];
  528:                   _ ->
  529:                       [{char,{1,1},C band 2#11111}]
  530:               end,
  531:          test_string(L, Ts)
  532:      end || C <- lists:seq($?, $Z) ++ lists:seq($a, $z)],
  533: 
  534:     [begin
  535:          L = "$\\" ++ [C],
  536:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},V}],
  537:          test_string(L, Ts)
  538:      end || {C,V} <- [{$n,$\n}, {$r,$\r}, {$t,$\t}, {$v,$\v},
  539:                       {$b,$\b}, {$f,$\f}, {$e,$\e}, {$s,$\s},
  540:                       {$d,$\d}]],
  541: 
  542:     EC = [$\n,$\r,$\t,$\v,$\b,$\f,$\e,$\s,$\d],
  543:     Ds = lists:seq($0, $9),
  544:     X = [$^,$n,$r,$t,$v,$b,$f,$e,$s,$d],
  545:     New = [${,$x],
  546:     No = EC ++ Ds ++ X ++ New,
  547:     [begin
  548:          L = "$\\" ++ [C],
  549:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  550:          test_string(L, Ts)
  551:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255) -- No],
  552: 
  553:     [begin
  554:          L = "'$\\" ++ [C] ++ "'",
  555:          Ts = [{atom,{1,1},list_to_atom("$"++[C])}],
  556:          test_string(L, Ts)
  557:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255) -- No],
  558: 
  559:     test_string("\"\\013a\\\n\"", [{string,{1,1},"\va\n"}]),
  560: 
  561:     test_string("'\n'", [{atom,{1,1},'\n'}]),
  562:     test_string("\"\n\a\"", [{string,{1,1},"\na"}]),
  563: 
  564:     %% No escape
  565:     [begin
  566:          L = "$" ++ [C],
  567:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  568:          test_string(L, Ts)
  569:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255) -- (No ++ [$\\])],
  570:     test_string("$\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  571: 
  572:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,4}} =
  573:         erl_scan:string("$\\^",{1,1}),
  574:     test_string("$\\\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  575:     %% Robert's scanner returns line 1:
  576:     test_string("$\\\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  577:     test_string("$\n\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  578:     test("$\n\n"),
  579:     ok.
  580: 
  581: 
  582: variables() ->
  583:     test_string("     \237_Aouåeiyäö", [{var,{1,7},'_Aouåeiyäö'}]),
  584:     test_string("A_b_c@", [{var,{1,1},'A_b_c@'}]),
  585:     test_string("V@2", [{var,{1,1},'V@2'}]),
  586:     test_string("ABDÀ", [{var,{1,1},'ABDÀ'}]),
  587:     test_string("Ärlig Östen", [{var,{1,1},'Ärlig'},{var,{1,7},'Östen'}]),
  588:     ok.
  589: 
  590: eof() ->
  591:     {done,{eof,1},eof} = erl_scan:tokens([], eof, 1),
  592:     {more, C1} = erl_scan:tokens([],"    \n", 1),
  593:     {done,{eof,2},eof} = erl_scan:tokens(C1, eof, 1),
  594:     {more, C2} = erl_scan:tokens([], "abra", 1),
  595:     %% An error before R13A.
  596:     %% {done,Err={error,{1,erl_scan,scan},1},eof} =
  597:     {done,{ok,[{atom,1,abra}],1},eof} =
  598:         erl_scan_tokens(C2, eof, 1),
  599: 
  600:     %% With column.
  601:     {more, C3} = erl_scan:tokens([],"    \n",{1,1}),
  602:     {done,{eof,{2,1}},eof} = erl_scan:tokens(C3, eof, 1),
  603:     {more, C4} = erl_scan:tokens([], "abra", {1,1}),
  604:     %% An error before R13A.
  605:     %% {done,{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,scan},{1,5}},eof} =
  606:     {done,{ok,[{atom,_,abra}],{1,5}},eof} =
  607:         erl_scan_tokens(C4, eof, 1),
  608: 
  609:     %% Robert's scanner returns "" as LeftoverChars;
  610:     %% the R12B scanner returns eof as LeftoverChars: (eof is correct)
  611:     {more, C5} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a", 1),
  612:     %% An error before R13A.
  613:     %% {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,scan},1},eof} =
  614:     {done,{ok,[{atom,1,a}],1},eof} =
  615:         erl_scan_tokens(C5,eof,1),
  616: 
  617:     %% With column.
  618:     {more, C6} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a", {1,1}),
  619:     %% An error before R13A.
  620:     %% {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,scan},1},eof} =
  621:     {done,{ok,[{atom,{1,1},a}],{1,2}},eof} =
  622:         erl_scan_tokens(C6,eof,1),
  623: 
  624:     %% A dot followed by eof is special:
  625:     {more, C} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a.", 1),
  626:     {done,{ok,[{atom,1,a},{dot,1}],1},eof} = erl_scan_tokens(C,eof,1),
  627:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{dot,1}],1} = erl_scan_string("foo."),
  628: 
  629:     %% With column.
  630:     {more, CCol} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a.", {1,1}),
  631:     {done,{ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},{dot,{1,2}}],{1,3}},eof} =
  632:         erl_scan_tokens(CCol,eof,1),
  633:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},foo},{dot,{1,4}}],{1,5}} =
  634:         erl_scan_string("foo.", {1,1}, []),
  635: 
  636:     ok.
  637: 
  638: illegal() ->
  639:     Atom = lists:duplicate(1000, $a),
  640:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1} = erl_scan:string(Atom),
  641:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1},". "} =
  642:         erl_scan:tokens([], Atom++". ", 1),
  643:     QAtom = "'" ++ Atom ++ "'",
  644:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1} = erl_scan:string(QAtom),
  645:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1},". "} =
  646:         erl_scan:tokens([], QAtom++". ", 1),
  647:     Var = lists:duplicate(1000, $A),
  648:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,var}},1} = erl_scan:string(Var),
  649:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,var}},1},". "} =
  650:         erl_scan:tokens([], Var++". ", 1),
  651:     Float = "1" ++ lists:duplicate(400, $0) ++ ".0",
  652:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1} = erl_scan:string(Float),
  653:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1},". "} =
  654:         erl_scan:tokens([], Float++". ", 1),
  655:     String = "\"43\\x{aaaaaa}34\"",
  656:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} = erl_scan:string(String),
  657:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1},"34\". "} =
  658:         %% Would be nice if `34\"' were skipped...
  659:         %% Maybe, but then the LeftOverChars would not be the characters
  660:         %% immediately following the end location of the error.
  661:         erl_scan:tokens([], String++". ", 1),
  662: 
  663:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1001}} =
  664:         erl_scan:string(Atom, {1,1}),
  665:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1005}},". "} =
  666:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++Atom++". ", {1,1}),
  667:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1003}} =
  668:         erl_scan:string(QAtom, {1,1}),
  669:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1007}},". "} =
  670:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++QAtom++". ", {1,1}),
  671:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,var}},{1,1001}} =
  672:         erl_scan:string(Var, {1,1}),
  673:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,var}},{1,1005}},". "} =
  674:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++Var++". ", {1,1}),
  675:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,404}} =
  676:         erl_scan:string(Float, {1,1}),
  677:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,408}},". "} =
  678:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++Float++". ", {1,1}),
  679:     {error,{{1,4},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,14}} =
  680:         erl_scan:string(String, {1,1}),
  681:     {done,{error,{{1,4},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,14}},"34\". "} =
  682:         erl_scan:tokens([], String++". ", {1,1}),
  683: 
  684:     %% GH-6477. Test for illegal characters in caret notation.
  685:     _ = [begin
  686:              S = [$$,$\\,$^,C],
  687:              {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} = erl_scan:string(S)
  688:          end || C <- lists:seq(0, 16#3e) ++ [16#60] ++ lists:seq($z+1, 16#10ffff)],
  689:     ok.
  690: 
  691: crashes() ->
  692:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([-1])}), % type error
  693:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch erl_scan:string("'a" ++ [999999999] ++ "c'")),
  694: 
  695:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$"++[-1])}),
  696:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\"++[-1])}),
  697:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\^"++[-1])}),
  698:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",-1,$"],{1,1})}),
  699:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("\"\\v"++[-1,$"])}), %$"
  700:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",-1,$"])}),
  701:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[-1])}),
  702:     {'EXIT',_} =
  703:          (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[-1],{1,1})}),
  704: 
  705:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([a])}), % type error
  706:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$"++[a])}),
  707:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\"++[a])}),
  708:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\^"++[a])}),
  709:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",a,$"],{1,1})}),
  710:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("\"\\v"++[a,$"])}), %$"
  711:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",a,$"])}),
  712:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[a])}),
  713:     {'EXIT',_} =
  714:          (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[a],{1,1})}),
  715: 
  716:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([3.0])}), % type error
  717:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("A" ++ [999999999])}),
  718: 
  719:     ok.
  720: 
  721: options() ->
  722:     %% line and column are not options, but tested here
  723:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{white_space,1," "},{comment,1,"% bar"}], 1} =
  724:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 1, return),
  725:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{white_space,1," "}],1} =
  726:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 1, return_white_spaces),
  727:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{comment,1,"% bar"}],1} =
  728:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 1, return_comments),
  729:     {ok,[{atom,17,foo}],17} =
  730:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 17),
  731:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
  732:         (catch {foo,
  733:                 erl_scan:string("foo % bar", {a,1}, [])}), % type error
  734:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}],{17,18}} =
  735:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", {17,9}, []),
  736:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
  737:         (catch {foo,
  738:                 erl_scan:string("foo % bar", {1,0}, [])}), % type error
  739:     {ok,[{foo,1}],1} =
  740:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar",1, [{reserved_word_fun,
  741:                                          fun(W) -> W =:= foo end}]),
  742:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =
  743:         (catch {foo,
  744:                 erl_scan:string("foo % bar",1, % type error
  745:                                 [{reserved_word_fun,
  746:                                   fun(W,_) -> W =:= foo end}])}),
  747:     ok.
  748: 
  749: more_options() ->
  750:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T1],{19,20}} =
  751:         erl_scan:string("foo", {19,17},[]),
  752:     {19,17} = erl_scan:location(T1),
  753:     {done,{ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T2,{dot,_}],{19,22}},[]} =
  754:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo. ", {19,17}, [bad_opt]), % type error
  755:     {19,17} = erl_scan:location(T2),
  756:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T3],{19,20}} =
  757:         erl_scan:string("foo", {19,17},[text]),
  758:     {19,17} = erl_scan:location(T3),
  759:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T3),
  760: 
  761:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T4],1} = erl_scan:string("foo", 1, [text]),
  762:     1 = erl_scan:line(T4),
  763:     1 = erl_scan:location(T4),
  764:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T4),
  765: 
  766:     ok.
  767: 
  768: token_info() ->
  769:     {ok,[T1],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", {1,18}, [text]),
  770:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =
  771:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:category(foo)}), % type error
  772:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =
  773:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:symbol(foo)}), % type error
  774:     atom = erl_scan:category(T1),
  775:     foo = erl_scan:symbol(T1),
  776: 
  777:     {ok,[T2],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", 1, []),
  778:     1 = erl_scan:line(T2),
  779:     undefined = erl_scan:column(T2),
  780:     undefined = erl_scan:text(T2),
  781:     1 = erl_scan:location(T2),
  782: 
  783:     {ok,[T3],_} = erl_scan:string("=", 1, []),
  784:     '=' = erl_scan:category(T3),
  785:     '=' = erl_scan:symbol(T3),
  786:     ok.
  787: 
  788: anno_info() ->
  789:     {'EXIT',_} =
  790:         (catch {foo,erl_scan:line(foo)}), % type error
  791:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T0],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", 19, [text]),
  792:     19 = erl_scan:location(T0),
  793:     19 = erl_scan:end_location(T0),
  794: 
  795:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T3],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", {1,3}, [text]),
  796:     1 = erl_scan:line(T3),
  797:     3 = erl_scan:column(T3),
  798:     {1,3} = erl_scan:location(T3),
  799:     {1,6} = erl_scan:end_location(T3),
  800:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T3),
  801: 
  802:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T4],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", 2, [text]),
  803:     2 = erl_scan:line(T4),
  804:     undefined = erl_scan:column(T4),
  805:     2 = erl_scan:location(T4),
  806:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T4),
  807: 
  808:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T5],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", {1,3}, []),
  809:     1 = erl_scan:line(T5),
  810:     3 = erl_scan:column(T5),
  811:     {1,3} = erl_scan:location(T5),
  812:     undefined = erl_scan:text(T5),
  813: 
  814:     ok.
  815: 
  816: column_errors() ->
  817:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{string,$',""}},{1,3}} = % $'
  818:         erl_scan:string("'\\",{1,1}),
  819:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{string,$",""}},{1,3}} = % $"
  820:         erl_scan:string("\"\\",{1,1}),
  821: 
  822:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{string,$',""}},{1,2}} =  % $'
  823:         erl_scan:string("'",{1,1}),
  824:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{string,$",""}},{1,2}} =  % $"
  825:         erl_scan:string("\"",{1,1}),
  826: 
  827:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,2}} =
  828:         erl_scan:string("$",{1,1}),
  829: 
  830:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{string,$',"1234567890123456"}},{1,20}} = %'
  831:         erl_scan:string(" '12345678901234567", {1,1}),
  832:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{string,$',"123456789012345 "}}, {1,20}} = %'
  833:         erl_scan:string(" '123456789012345\\s", {1,1}),
  834:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{string,$","1234567890123456"}},{1,20}} = %"
  835:         erl_scan:string(" \"12345678901234567", {1,1}),
  836:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{string,$","123456789012345 "}}, {1,20}} = %"
  837:         erl_scan:string(" \"123456789012345\\s", {1,1}),
  838:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{string,$',"1234567890123456"}},{2,1}} = %'
  839:         erl_scan:string(" '12345678901234567\n", {1,1}),
  840:     ok.
  841: 
  842: white_spaces() ->
  843:     {ok,[{white_space,_,"\r"},
  844:                {white_space,_,"   "},
  845:                {atom,_,a},
  846:                {white_space,_,"\n"}],
  847:            _} = erl_scan_string("\r   a\n", {1,1}, return),
  848:     test("\r   a\n"),
  849:     L = "{\"a\nb\", \"a\\nb\",\nabc\r,def}.\n\n",
  850:     {ok,[{'{',_},
  851:                {string,_,"a\nb"},
  852:                {',',_},
  853:                {white_space,_," "},
  854:                {string,_,"a\nb"},
  855:                {',',_},
  856:                {white_space,_,"\n"},
  857:                {atom,_,abc},
  858:                {white_space,_,"\r"},
  859:                {',',_},
  860:                {atom,_,def},
  861:                {'}',_},
  862:                {dot,_},
  863:                {white_space,_,"\n"}],
  864:            _} = erl_scan_string(L, {1,1}, return),
  865:     test(L),
  866:     test("\"\n\"\n"),
  867:     test("\n\r\n"),
  868:     test("\n\r"),
  869:     test("\r\n"),
  870:     test("\n\f"),
  871:     [test(lists:duplicate(N, $\t)) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  872:     [test([$\n|lists:duplicate(N, $\t)]) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  873:     [test(lists:duplicate(N, $\s)) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  874:     [test([$\n|lists:duplicate(N, $\s)]) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  875:     test("\v\f\n\v "),
  876:     test("\n\e\n\b\f\n\da\n"),
  877:     ok.
  878: 
  879: unicode() ->
  880:     {ok,[{char,1,83},{integer,1,45}],1} =
  881:         erl_scan_string("$\\12345"), % not unicode
  882: 
  883:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
  884:         erl_scan:string([1089]),
  885:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =
  886:         erl_scan:string([1089], {1,1}),
  887:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =
  888:         erl_scan:string([16#D800], {1,1}),
  889: 
  890:     test("\"a"++[1089]++"b\""),
  891:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
  892:         erl_scan_string([$$,$\\,$^,1089], 1),
  893: 
  894:     {error,{1,erl_scan,Error},1} =
  895:         erl_scan:string("\"qa\x{aaa}", 1),
  896:     "unterminated string starting with \"qa"++[2730]++"\"" =
  897:         erl_scan:format_error(Error),
  898:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,_},{1,11}} =
  899:         erl_scan:string("\"qa\\x{aaa}",{1,1}),
  900:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,_},{1,11}} =
  901:         erl_scan:string("'qa\\x{aaa}",{1,1}),
  902: 
  903:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} =
  904:         erl_scan_string([$$,1089], 1),
  905:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} =
  906:         erl_scan_string([$$,$\\,1089], 1),
  907: 
  908:     Qs = "$\\x{aaa}",
  909:     {ok,[{char,1,$\x{aaa}}],1} =
  910:         erl_scan_string(Qs, 1),
  911:     {ok,[Q2],{1,9}} =
  912:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{aaa}", {1,1}, [text]),
  913:     [{category,char},{column,1},{line,1},{symbol,16#aaa},{text,Qs}] =
  914:         token_info_long(Q2),
  915: 
  916:     U1 = "\"\\x{aaa}\"",
  917:     {ok,[{string,_,[2730]}=T1],{1,10}} = erl_scan:string(U1, {1,1}, [text]),
  918:     {1,1} = erl_scan:location(T1),
  919:     "\"\\x{aaa}\"" = erl_scan:text(T1),
  920:     {ok,[{string,1,[2730]}],1} = erl_scan_string(U1, 1),
  921: 
  922:     U2 = "\"\\x41\\x{fff}\\x42\"",
  923:     {ok,[{string,1,[$\x41,$\x{fff},$\x42]}],1} = erl_scan_string(U2, 1),
  924: 
  925:     U3 = "\"a\n\\x{fff}\n\"",
  926:     {ok,[{string,1,[$a,$\n,$\x{fff},$\n]}],3} = erl_scan_string(U3, 1),
  927: 
  928:     U4 = "\"\n\\x{aaa}\n\"",
  929:     {ok,[{string,1,[$\n,$\x{aaa},$\n]}],3} = erl_scan_string(U4, 1),
  930: 
  931:     %% Keep these tests:
  932:     test(Qs),
  933:     test(U1),
  934:     test(U2),
  935:     test(U3),
  936:     test(U4),
  937: 
  938:     Str1 = "\"ab" ++ [1089] ++ "cd\"",
  939:     {ok,[{string,1,[$a,$b,1089,$c,$d]}],1} = erl_scan_string(Str1, 1),
  940:     {ok,[{string,{1,1},[$a,$b,1089,$c,$d]}],{1,8}} =
  941:         erl_scan_string(Str1, {1,1}),
  942:     test(Str1),
  943:     Comment = "%% "++[1089],
  944:     {ok,[{comment,1,[$%,$%,$\s,1089]}],1} =
  945:         erl_scan_string(Comment, 1, [return]),
  946:     {ok,[{comment,{1,1},[$%,$%,$\s,1089]}],{1,5}} =
  947:         erl_scan_string(Comment, {1,1}, [return]),
  948:     ok.
  949: 
  950: more_chars() ->
  951:     %% Due to unicode, the syntax has been incompatibly augmented:
  952:     %% $\x{...}, $\xHH
  953: 
  954:     %% All kinds of tests...
  955:     {ok,[{char,_,123}],{1,4}} =
  956:         erl_scan_string("$\\{",{1,1}),
  957:     {more, C1} = erl_scan:tokens([], "$\\{", {1,1}),
  958:     {done,{ok,[{char,_,123}],{1,4}},eof} =
  959:         erl_scan_tokens(C1, eof, 1),
  960:     {ok,[{char,1,123},{atom,1,a},{'}',1}],1} =
  961:         erl_scan_string("$\\{a}"),
  962: 
  963:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,4}} =
  964:         erl_scan:string("$\\x", {1,1}),
  965:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,5}} =
  966:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{",{1,1}),
  967:     {more, C3} = erl_scan:tokens([], "$\\x", {1,1}),
  968:     {done,{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,4}},eof} =
  969:         erl_scan:tokens(C3, eof, 1),
  970:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,5}} =
  971:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{",{1,1}),
  972:     {more, C2} = erl_scan:tokens([], "$\\x{", {1,1}),
  973:     {done,{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,5}},eof} =
  974:         erl_scan:tokens(C2, eof, 1),
  975:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
  976:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{g}"),
  977:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,5}} =
  978:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{g}", {1,1}),
  979:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,6}} =
  980:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{}",{1,1}),
  981: 
  982:     test("\"\\{0}\""),
  983:     test("\"\\x{0}\""),
  984:     test("\'\\{0}\'"),
  985:     test("\'\\x{0}\'"),
  986: 
  987:     {error,{{2,3},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{2,6}} =
  988:         erl_scan:string("\"ab \n $\\x{g}\"",{1,1}),
  989:     {error,{{2,3},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{2,6}} =
  990:         erl_scan:string("\'ab \n $\\x{g}\'",{1,1}),
  991: 
  992:     test("$\\{34}"),
  993:     test("$\\x{34}"),
  994:     test("$\\{377}"),
  995:     test("$\\x{FF}"),
  996:     test("$\\{400}"),
  997:     test("$\\x{100}"),
  998:     test("$\\x{10FFFF}"),
  999:     test("$\\x{10ffff}"),
 1000:     test("\"$\n \\{1}\""),
 1001:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
 1002:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{110000}"),
 1003:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,12}} =
 1004:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{110000}", {1,1}),
 1005: 
 1006:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,4}} =
 1007:         erl_scan:string("$\\xfg", {1,1}),
 1008: 
 1009:     test("$\\xffg"),
 1010: 
 1011:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,4}} =
 1012:         erl_scan:string("$\\xg", {1,1}),
 1013:     ok.

 1015: %% OTP-10302. Unicode characters scanner/parser.
 1016: otp_10302(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1017:     %% From unicode():
 1018:     {ok,[{atom,1,'aсb'}],1} =

 1020:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},'qaપ'}],{1,12}} =
 1021:         erl_scan_string("'qa\\x{aaa}'",{1,1}),

 1024:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} = erl_scan_string([$$,$\\,1089],1),
 1025:

 1029:     [{category,char},{column,1},{line,1},{symbol,16#aaa},{text,Qs}] =
 1030:         token_info_long(Q2),
 1031:

 1050:         erl_scan_string(Str1, {1,1}),

 1053:     OK2 = 16#DFFF+1,

 1055:     OK4 = 16#FFFF+1,

 1062:     IllegalL = [Illegal1,Illegal2,Illegal3,Illegal4],
 1063:

 1066:         OK <- OKL],

 1068:         erl_scan_string("%% "++[OK1], {1,1}, [return]),

 1070:          erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal], 1, [return]) ||
 1071:         Illegal <- IllegalL],

 1076:         OK <- OKL],
 1077:     {ok,[],{1,5}} = erl_scan_string("%% "++[OK1], {1,1}, []),
 1078:     [{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
 1079:          erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal], 1, []) ||
 1080:         Illegal <- IllegalL],
 1081:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,5}} =
 1082:         erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal1], {1,1}, []),

 1087:     [{error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,3}} =
 1088:          erl_scan:string("\""++[OK]++"\"",{1,1}) ||
 1089:         OK <- IllegalL],
 1090: 
 1091:     [{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =
 1092:         erl_scan:string([Illegal],{1,1}) ||
 1093:         Illegal <- IllegalL],
 1094:

 1097:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =

 1113:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{D800}",{1,1}),

 1115:     %% Not erl_scan, but erl_parse.
 1116:     {integer,0,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1),

 1122:         erl_parse_abstract(<<1,2>>),
 1123:     {cons,0,{tuple,0,[{atom,0,a}]},{atom,0,b}} =
 1124:         erl_parse_abstract([{a} | b]),

 1127:      {integer,0,$a},

 1129:         erl_parse_abstract("a"++[55296]++"c"),
 1130: 
 1131:     Line = 17,
 1132:     {integer,Line,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Line),
 1133:     Float = 3.14, {float,Line,Float} = erl_parse_abstract(Float, Line),
 1134:     {nil,Line} = erl_parse_abstract([], Line),
 1135:     {bin,Line,
 1136:      [{bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,1},default,default},
 1137:       {bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,2},default,default}]} =
 1138:         erl_parse_abstract(<<1,2>>, Line),
 1139:     {cons,Line,{tuple,Line,[{atom,Line,a}]},{atom,Line,b}} =
 1140:         erl_parse_abstract([{a} | b], Line),
 1141:     {string,Line,"str"} = erl_parse_abstract("str", Line),

 1152:      [{bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,1},default,default},

 1154:         erl_parse_abstract(<<1,2>>, Opts1),

 1156:         erl_parse_abstract([{a} | b], Opts1),

 1162: 
 1163:     [begin

 1167:          {bin,Line,
 1168:           [{bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,1},default,default},

 1170:              erl_parse_abstract(<<1,2>>, Opts2),

 1190: %% OTP-10992. List of floats to abstract format.
 1191: otp_10992(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1192:     {cons,0,{float,0,42.0},{nil,0}} =
 1193:         erl_parse_abstract([42.0], [{encoding,unicode}]),

 1202: %% OTP-11807. Generalize erl_parse:abstract/2.
 1203: otp_11807(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1204:     {cons,0,{integer,0,97},{cons,0,{integer,0,98},{nil,0}}} =

 1207:         erl_parse_abstract([-1], [{encoding,latin1}]),
 1208:     ASCII = fun(I) -> I >= 0 andalso I < 128 end,
 1209:     {string,0,"xyz"} = erl_parse_abstract("xyz", [{encoding,ASCII}]),
 1210:     {cons,0,{integer,0,228},{nil,0}} =
 1211:         erl_parse_abstract([228], [{encoding,ASCII}]),

 1223: otp_17024(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1224:     Line = 17,
 1225:     Opts1 = [{location,Line}],
 1226:     {integer,Line,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Opts1),
 1227:     Location = {17, 42},
 1228:     {integer,Location,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Location),
 1229:     Opts2 = [{location,Location}],
 1230:     {integer,Location,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Opts2),
 1231:     ok.
 1232: 
 1233: text_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1234:     KeepClass = fun(Class) ->
 1235:                         fun(C, _) -> C == Class end
 1236:                 end,
 1237: 
 1238:     Join = fun(L, S) -> string:join(L, S) end,
 1239:     String = fun(L) -> Join(L, " ") end,
 1240: 
 1241:     TextAtom = KeepClass(atom),
 1242:     TextInt = KeepClass(integer),
 1243:     %% Keep text for integers written with a base.
 1244:     TextBase = fun(C, S) ->
 1245:                        C == integer andalso string:find(S, "#") /= nomatch
 1246:                end,
 1247:     %% Keep text for long strings, regardless of class
 1248:     TextLong = fun(_, S) -> length(S) > 10 end,
 1249: 
 1250:     Texts = fun(Toks) -> [erl_scan:text(T) || T <- Toks] end,
 1251:     Values =  fun(Toks) -> [erl_scan:symbol(T) || T <- Toks] end,
 1252: 
 1253:     Atom1 = "foo",
 1254:     Atom2 = "'this is a long atom'",
 1255:     Int1 = "42",
 1256:     Int2 = "16#10",
 1257:     Int3 = "8#20",
 1258:     Int4 = "16",
 1259:     Int5 = "12345678901234567890",
 1260:     String1 = "\"A String\"",
 1261:     String2 = "\"guitar string\"",
 1262:     Name1 = "Short",
 1263:     Name2 = "LongAndDescriptiveName",
 1264:     Sep1 = "{",
 1265:     Sep2 = "+",
 1266:     Sep3 = "]",
 1267:     Sep4 = "/",
 1268: 
 1269:     All = [Atom1, Atom2, Int1, Int2, Int3, Int4, Int5,
 1270:            String1, String2, Name1, Name2,
 1271:            Sep1, Sep2, Sep3, Sep4],
 1272: 
 1273:     {ok, Tokens0, 2} =
 1274:         erl_scan:string(String([Atom1, Int1]), 2, [{text_fun, TextAtom}]),
 1275:     [Atom1, undefined] = Texts(Tokens0),
 1276:     [foo, 42] = Values(Tokens0),
 1277: 
 1278:     {ok, Tokens1, 3} =
 1279:         erl_scan:string(Join([Int2, Int3, Int4], "\n"), 1,
 1280:                         [{text_fun, TextInt}]),
 1281:     [Int2, Int3, Int4] = Texts(Tokens1),
 1282:     [16, 16, 16] = Values(Tokens1),
 1283: 
 1284:     TS = [Int2, String1, Atom1, Int3, Int4, String2],
 1285:     {ok, Tokens2, 6} =
 1286:         %% If text is present, we supply text for *all* tokens.
 1287:         erl_scan:string(Join(TS, "\n"), 1, [{text_fun, TextAtom}, text]),
 1288:     TS = Texts(Tokens2),
 1289:     [16, "A String", foo, 16, 16, "guitar string"] = Values(Tokens2),
 1290: 
 1291:     Ints = [Int1, Int2, Int3, Int4],
 1292:     {ok, Tokens3, 1} = erl_scan:string(String(Ints), 1, [{text_fun, TextBase}]),
 1293:     [undefined, Int2, Int3, undefined] = Texts(Tokens3),
 1294:     [42, 16, 16, 16] = Values(Tokens3),
 1295: 
 1296:     Longs = lists:filter(fun(S) -> length(S) > 10 end, All),
 1297:     {ok, Tokens4, 1} =
 1298:         erl_scan:string(String(All), 1, [{text_fun, TextLong}]),
 1299:     Longs = lists:filter(fun(T) -> T /= undefined end, Texts(Tokens4)),
 1300: 
 1301:     {ok, Tokens5, 7} =
 1302:         erl_scan:string(String(All), 7, [{text_fun, KeepClass('{')}]),
 1303:     [Sep1] = lists:filter(fun(T) -> T /= undefined end, Texts(Tokens5)).
 1304: 
 1305: triple_quoted_string(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1306:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],2} =
 1307:         erl_scan:string(
 1308:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1309:           "\"\"\""),
 1310: 
 1311:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],3} =
 1312:         erl_scan:string(
 1313:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1314:           "\n"
 1315:           "\"\"\""),
 1316: 
 1317:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],3} =
 1318:         erl_scan:string(
 1319:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1320:           " \n"
 1321:           " \"\"\""),
 1322: 
 1323:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],3} =
 1324:         erl_scan:string(
 1325:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1326:           "\n"
 1327:           " \"\"\""),
 1328: 
 1329:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],3} =
 1330:         erl_scan:string(
 1331:           "\"\"\"\r\n"
 1332:           "  \r\n"
 1333:           "  \"\"\""),
 1334: 
 1335:     {error,{{2,2},erl_scan,indentation},{3,6}} =
 1336:         erl_scan:string(
 1337:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1338:           " \n" % One space too little indentation
 1339:           "  \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1340: 
 1341:     {ok,[{string,1,"\n"}],4} =
 1342:         erl_scan:string(
 1343:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1344:           "\n"
 1345:           "\n"
 1346:           "\"\"\""),
 1347: 
 1348:     {ok,[{string,1,"\r\n"}],4} =
 1349:         erl_scan:string(
 1350:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1351:           "  \r\n"
 1352:           "  \n"
 1353:           "  \"\"\""),
 1354: 
 1355:     {ok,[{string,1,"\n"}],4} =
 1356:         erl_scan:string(
 1357:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1358:           "  \n"
 1359:           "\r\n"
 1360:           "  \"\"\""),
 1361: 
 1362:     {ok,[{string,1,"\r\n"}],4} =
 1363:         erl_scan:string(
 1364:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1365:           "\r\n"
 1366:           "  \n"
 1367:           "  \"\"\""),
 1368: 
 1369:     {error,{{3,2},erl_scan,indentation},{4,6}} =
 1370:         erl_scan:string(
 1371:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1372:           "  \n"
 1373:           " \r\n"
 1374:           "  \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1375: 
 1376:     {error,{{2,3},erl_scan,indentation},{4,7}} =
 1377:         erl_scan:string(
 1378:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1379:           "  \n" % One space too little indentation
 1380:           "   \r\n"
 1381:           "   \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1382: 
 1383:     {ok,[{string,1,"CR LF"}],3} =
 1384:         erl_scan:string(
 1385:           "\"\"\" \t\r\n"
 1386:           "CR LF\r\n"
 1387:           "\"\"\""),
 1388: 
 1389:     {ok,[{string,1,"this is a\nvery long\nstring"}],5} =
 1390:         erl_scan:string(
 1391:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1392:           "this is a\n"
 1393:           "very long\n"
 1394:           "string\n"
 1395:           "\"\"\""),
 1396:

 1398:         erl_scan:string(

 1400:           "  this is a\r\n"
 1401:           "  very long\r\n"
 1402:           "  string\r\n"
 1403:           "  \"\"\""),
 1404: 
 1405:     {ok,
 1406:      [{string,1,
 1407:        "this is a string\r\n"
 1408:        "\n"
 1409:        "\r\n"
 1410:        "with three empty lines\n"
 1411:        "\r\n"}],
 1412:      8} =
 1413:         erl_scan:string(
 1414:           "\"\"\"\r\n"
 1415:           "  this is a string\r\n"
 1416:           "\n"
 1417:           "  \r\n"
 1418:           "  with three empty lines\n"
 1419:           "\r\n"
 1420:           "\n"
 1421:           "  \"\"\""),
 1422: 
 1423:     {ok,[{string,1,"  this is a\n    very long\n  string"}],5} =
 1424:         erl_scan:string(
 1425:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1426:           "\t  this is a\n"
 1427:           "\t    very long\n"
 1428:           "\t  string\n"
 1429:           "\t\"\"\""),
 1430: 
 1431:     {ok,[{string,1,"this is a \\\\\nvery long \\\\\nstring\\\\"}],5} =
 1432:         erl_scan:string(
 1433:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1434:           "this is a \\\\\n"
 1435:           "very long \\\\\n"
 1436:           "string\\\\\n"
 1437:           "\"\"\""),
 1438: 
 1439:     {ok,[{string,1,
 1440:           "this contains \"quotes\"\n"
 1441:           "and \"\"\"triple quotes\"\"\"\n"
 1442:           " \"\" \"\"\" and\n"
 1443:           "ends here"}],6} =
 1444:         erl_scan:string(
 1445:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1446:           "this contains \"quotes\"\n"
 1447:           "and \"\"\"triple quotes\"\"\"\n"
 1448:           " \"\" \"\"\" and\n"
 1449:           "ends here\n"
 1450:           "\"\"\""),
 1451: 
 1452:     {ok,[{string,{1,1},
 1453:           "```erlang\n"
 1454:           "foo() ->\n"
 1455:           "    \"\"\"\n"
 1456:           "    foo\n"
 1457:           "    bar\n"
 1458:           "    \"\"\".\n"
 1459:           "```"}],{9,5}} =
 1460:         erl_scan:string(
 1461:           "\"\"\"\"\n"
 1462:           "```erlang\n"
 1463:           "foo() ->\n"
 1464:           "    \"\"\"\n"
 1465:           "    foo\n"
 1466:           "    bar\n"
 1467:           "    \"\"\".\n"
 1468:           "```\n"
 1469:           "\"\"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1470: 
 1471:     {ok,[{string,{1,1},"5-quoted"}],{3,8}} =
 1472:         erl_scan:string(
 1473:           "\"\"\"\"\"\n"
 1474:           "  5-quoted\n"
 1475:           "  \"\"\"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1476: 
 1477:     {error,{{1,4},erl_scan,white_space},{2,4}} =
 1478:         erl_scan:string(
 1479:           "\"\"\"foo\n" % Only white-space allowed after opening quote seq
 1480:           "\"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1481: 
 1482:     {error,{{2,2},erl_scan,indentation},{3,6}} =
 1483:         erl_scan:string(
 1484:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1485:           " foo\n" % One space too little indentation
 1486:           "  \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1487: 
 1488:     {error,{{2,8},erl_scan,indentation},{3,12}} =
 1489:         erl_scan:string(
 1490:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1491:           "       \tfoo\n" % The tab shoud be a space
 1492:           "        \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1493: 
 1494:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{string,{$",3},"\n\tx\n\t\"\""}},{3,4}} =
 1495:         erl_scan:string(
 1496:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1497:           "\tx\n"
 1498:           "\t\"\"", % Lacking one double-quote char in closing seq
 1499:           {1,1}, []),
 1500: 
 1501:     {error,{{3,4},erl_scan,string_concat},{3,4}} =
 1502:         erl_scan:string(
 1503:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1504:           "x\n"
 1505:           "\"\"\"\"",
 1506:           %% Bad end delimiter: adjacent string start without white space
 1507:           {1,1}, []),
 1508: 
 1509:     {error,{{3,2},erl_scan,string_concat},{3,2}} =
 1510:         erl_scan:string(
 1511:           "\"\n"
 1512:           "x\n"
 1513:           "\"\"\"",
 1514:           %% False triple-quote: adjacent string start without white space
 1515:           {1,1}, []),
 1516: 
 1517:     {error,{{1,6},erl_scan,string_concat},{1,6}} =
 1518:         %% Adjacent string start without white space
 1519:         erl_scan:string("\"abc\"\"def\"", {1,1}, []),
 1520: 
 1521:     {ok,[{string,1,[16#D000]}],3} =
 1522:         erl_scan:string(
 1523:           [$",$",$",$\n,
 1524:            16#D000,$\n, % Unicode character
 1525:            $",$",$"]),
 1526: 
 1527:     {error,{2,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},2} =
 1528:         erl_scan:string(
 1529:           [$",$",$",$\n,
 1530:            16#FFFF,$\n, % Out of Unicode range
 1531:            $",$",$"]),
 1532: 
 1533:     %% Test the real deal in this source code
 1534:     """"
 1535:     ```erlang
 1536:     foo() ->
 1537:         """
 1538:         \foo
 1539:         \bar
 1540:         """.
 1541:     ```
 1542:     """"
 1543:         =
 1544:         "```erlang
 1545: foo() ->
 1546:     \"\"\"
 1547:     \\foo
 1548:     \\bar
 1549:     \"\"\".
 1550: ```",
 1551:     ok.
 1552: 
 1553: test_string(String, ExpectedWithCol) ->
 1554:     {ok, ExpectedWithCol, _EndWithCol} = erl_scan_string(String, {1, 1}, []),
 1555:     Expected = [ begin
 1556:                      {L,_C} = element(2, T),
 1557:                      setelement(2, T, L)
 1558:                  end
 1559:                     || T <- ExpectedWithCol ],
 1560:     {ok, Expected, _End} = erl_scan_string(String),
 1561:     test(String).
 1562: 
 1563: erl_scan_string(String) ->
 1564:     erl_scan_string(String, 1, []).
 1565: 
 1566: erl_scan_string(String, StartLocation) ->
 1567:     erl_scan_string(String, StartLocation, []).
 1568: 
 1569: erl_scan_string(String, StartLocation, Options) ->
 1570:     case erl_scan:string(String, StartLocation, Options) of
 1571:         {ok, Tokens, EndLocation} ->
 1572:             {ok, unopaque_tokens(Tokens), EndLocation};
 1573:         Else ->
 1574:             Else
 1575:     end.
 1576: 
 1577: erl_scan_tokens(C, S, L) ->
 1578:     erl_scan_tokens(C, S, L, []).
 1579: 
 1580: erl_scan_tokens(C, S, L, O) ->
 1581:     case erl_scan:tokens(C, S, L, O) of
 1582:         {done, {ok, Ts, End}, R} ->
 1583:             {done, {ok, unopaque_tokens(Ts), End}, R};
 1584:         Else ->
 1585:             Else
 1586:     end.
 1587: 
 1588: unopaque_tokens([]) ->
 1589:     [];
 1590: unopaque_tokens([Token|Tokens]) ->
 1591:     Attrs = element(2, Token),
 1592:     Term = erl_anno:to_term(Attrs),
 1593:     T = setelement(2, Token, Term),
 1594:     [T | unopaque_tokens(Tokens)].
 1595: 
 1596: erl_parse_abstract(Term) ->
 1597:     erl_parse_abstract(Term, []).
 1598: 
 1599: erl_parse_abstract(Term, Options) ->
 1600:     Abstr = erl_parse:abstract(Term, Options),
 1601:     unopaque_abstract(Abstr).
 1602: 
 1603: unopaque_abstract(Abstr) ->
 1604:     erl_parse:anno_to_term(Abstr).
 1605: 
 1606: %% test_string(String, Expected, StartLocation, Options) ->
 1607: %%     {ok, Expected, _End} = erl_scan:string(String, StartLocation, Options),
 1608: %%     test(String).
 1609: 
 1610: %% There are no checks of the tags...
 1611: test(String) ->
 1612:     %% io:format("Testing `~ts'~n", [String]),
 1613:     [{Tokens, End},
 1614:      {Wtokens, Wend},
 1615:      {Ctokens, Cend},
 1616:      {CWtokens, CWend},
 1617:      {CWtokens2, _}] =
 1618:         [scan_string_with_column(String, X) ||
 1619:             X <- [[],
 1620:                   [return_white_spaces],
 1621:                   [return_comments],
 1622:                   [return],
 1623:                   [return]]], % for white space compaction test
 1624: 
 1625:     {end1,End,Wend} = {end1,Wend,End},
 1626:     {end2,Wend,Cend} = {end2,Cend,Wend},
 1627:     {end3,Cend,CWend} = {end3,CWend,Cend},
 1628: 
 1629:     %% Test that the tokens that are common to two token lists are identical.
 1630:     {none,Tokens} = {none, filter_tokens(CWtokens, [white_space,comment])},
 1631:     {comments,Ctokens} =
 1632:         {comments,filter_tokens(CWtokens, [white_space])},
 1633:     {white_spaces,Wtokens} =
 1634:         {white_spaces,filter_tokens(CWtokens, [comment])},
 1635: 
 1636:     %% Use token attributes to extract parts from the original string,
 1637:     %% and check that the parts are identical to the token strings.
 1638:     {Line,Column} = test_decorated_tokens(String, CWtokens),
 1639:     {deco,{Line,Column},End} = {deco,End,{Line,Column}},
 1640: 
 1641:     %% Almost the same again: concat texts to get the original:
 1642:     Text = get_text(CWtokens),
 1643:     {text,Text,String} = {text,String,Text},
 1644: 
 1645:     %% Test that white spaces occupy less heap than the worst case.
 1646:     ok = test_white_space_compaction(CWtokens, CWtokens2),
 1647: 
 1648:     %% Test that white newlines are always first in text:
 1649:     WhiteTokens = select_tokens(CWtokens, [white_space]),
 1650:     ok = newlines_first(WhiteTokens),
 1651: 
 1652:     %% Line attribute only:
 1653:     [Simple,Wsimple,Csimple,WCsimple] = Simples =
 1654:         [element(2, erl_scan:string(String, 1, Opts)) ||
 1655:             Opts <- [[],
 1656:                      [return_white_spaces],
 1657:                      [return_comments],
 1658:                      [return]]],
 1659:     {consistent,true} = {consistent,consistent_attributes(Simples)},
 1660:     {simple_wc,WCsimple} = {simple_wc,simplify(CWtokens)},
 1661:     {simple,Simple} = {simple,filter_tokens(WCsimple, [white_space,comment])},
 1662:     {simple_c,Csimple} = {simple_c,filter_tokens(WCsimple, [white_space])},
 1663:     {simple_w,Wsimple} = {simple_w,filter_tokens(WCsimple, [comment])},
 1664: 
 1665:     %% Line attribute only, with text:
 1666:     [SimpleTxt,WsimpleTxt,CsimpleTxt,WCsimpleTxt] = SimplesTxt =
 1667:         [element(2, erl_scan:string(String, 1, [text|Opts])) ||
 1668:             Opts <- [[],
 1669:                      [return_white_spaces],
 1670:                      [return_comments],
 1671:                      [return]]],
 1672:     TextTxt = get_text(WCsimpleTxt),
 1673:     {text_txt,TextTxt,String} = {text_txt,String,TextTxt},
 1674:     {consistent_txt,true} =
 1675:         {consistent_txt,consistent_attributes(SimplesTxt)},
 1676:     {simple_txt,SimpleTxt} =
 1677:         {simple_txt,filter_tokens(WCsimpleTxt, [white_space,comment])},
 1678:     {simple_c_txt,CsimpleTxt} =
 1679:         {simple_c_txt,filter_tokens(WCsimpleTxt, [white_space])},
 1680:     {simple_w_txt,WsimpleTxt} =
 1681:         {simple_w_txt,filter_tokens(WCsimpleTxt, [comment])},
 1682: 
 1683:     ok.
 1684: 
 1685: test_white_space_compaction(Tokens, Tokens2) when Tokens =:= Tokens2 ->
 1686:     [WS, WS2] = [select_tokens(Ts, [white_space]) || Ts <- [Tokens, Tokens2]],
 1687:     test_wsc(WS, WS2).
 1688: 
 1689: test_wsc([], []) ->
 1690:     ok;
 1691: test_wsc([Token|Tokens], [Token2|Tokens2]) ->
 1692:     [Text, Text2] = [Text ||
 1693:                         Text <- [erl_scan:text(T) || T <- [Token, Token2]]],
 1694:     Sz = erts_debug:size(Text),
 1695:     Sz2 = erts_debug:size({Text, Text2}),
 1696:     IsCompacted = Sz2 < 2*Sz+erts_debug:size({a,a}),
 1697:     ToBeCompacted = is_compacted(Text),
 1698:     if
 1699:         IsCompacted =:= ToBeCompacted ->
 1700:             test_wsc(Tokens, Tokens2);
 1701:         true ->
 1702:             {compaction_error, Token}
 1703:     end.
 1704: 
 1705: is_compacted("\r") ->
 1706:     true;
 1707: is_compacted("\n\r") ->
 1708:     true;
 1709: is_compacted("\n\f") ->
 1710:     true;
 1711: is_compacted([$\n|String]) ->
 1712:       all_spaces(String)
 1713:     orelse
 1714:       all_tabs(String);
 1715: is_compacted(String) ->
 1716:       all_spaces(String)
 1717:     orelse
 1718:       all_tabs(String).
 1719: 
 1720: all_spaces(L) ->
 1721:     all_same(L, $\s).
 1722: 
 1723: all_tabs(L) ->
 1724:     all_same(L, $\t).
 1725: 
 1726: all_same(L, Char) ->
 1727:     lists:all(fun(C) -> C =:= Char end, L).
 1728: 
 1729: newlines_first([]) ->
 1730:     ok;
 1731: newlines_first([Token|Tokens]) ->
 1732:     Text = erl_scan:text(Token),
 1733:     Nnls = length([C || C <- Text, C =:= $\n]),
 1734:     OK = case Text of
 1735:              [$\n|_] ->
 1736:                  Nnls =:= 1;
 1737:              _ ->
 1738:                  Nnls =:= 0
 1739:          end,
 1740:     if
 1741:         OK -> newlines_first(Tokens);
 1742:         true -> OK
 1743:     end.
 1744: 
 1745: filter_tokens(Tokens, Tags) ->
 1746:     lists:filter(fun(T) -> not lists:member(element(1, T), Tags) end, Tokens).
 1747: 
 1748: select_tokens(Tokens, Tags) ->
 1749:     lists:filter(fun(T) -> lists:member(element(1, T), Tags) end, Tokens).
 1750: 
 1751: simplify([Token|Tokens]) ->
 1752:     Line = erl_scan:line(Token),
 1753:     [setelement(2, Token, erl_anno:new(Line)) | simplify(Tokens)];
 1754: simplify([]) ->
 1755:     [].
 1756: 
 1757: get_text(Tokens) ->
 1758:     lists:flatten(
 1759:       [T ||
 1760:           Token <- Tokens,
 1761:           (T = erl_scan:text(Token)) =/= []]).
 1762: 
 1763: test_decorated_tokens(String, Tokens) ->
 1764:     ToksAttrs = token_attrs(Tokens),
 1765:     test_strings(ToksAttrs, String, 1, 1).
 1766: 
 1767: token_attrs(Tokens) ->
 1768:     [{L,C,length(T),T} ||
 1769:         Token <- Tokens,
 1770:         ([C,L,T] = token_info(Token)) =/= []].
 1771: 
 1772: token_info(T) ->
 1773:     Column = erl_scan:column(T),
 1774:     Line = erl_scan:line(T),
 1775:     Text = erl_scan:text(T),
 1776:     [Column, Line, Text].
 1777: 
 1778: token_info_long(T) ->
 1779:     Column = erl_scan:column(T),
 1780:     Line = erl_scan:line(T),
 1781:     Text = erl_scan:text(T),
 1782:     Category = erl_scan:category(T),
 1783:     Symbol = erl_scan:symbol(T),
 1784:     [{category,Category},{column,Column},{line,Line},
 1785:      {symbol,Symbol},{text,Text}].
 1786: 
 1787: test_strings([], _S, Line, Column) ->
 1788:     {Line,Column};
 1789: test_strings([{L,C,Len,T}=Attr|Attrs], String0, Line0, Column0) ->
 1790:     {String1, Column1} = skip_newlines(String0, L, Line0, Column0),
 1791:     String = skip_chars(String1, C-Column1),
 1792:     {Str,Rest} = lists:split(Len, String),
 1793:     if
 1794:         Str =:= T ->
 1795:             {Line,Column} = string_newlines(T, L, C),
 1796:             test_strings(Attrs, Rest, Line, Column);
 1797:         true ->
 1798:             {token_error, Attr, Str}
 1799:     end.
 1800: 
 1801: skip_newlines(String, Line, Line, Column) ->
 1802:     {String, Column};
 1803: skip_newlines([$\n|String], L, Line, _Column) ->
 1804:     skip_newlines(String, L, Line+1, 1);
 1805: skip_newlines([_|String], L, Line, Column) ->
 1806:     skip_newlines(String, L, Line, Column+1).
 1807: 
 1808: skip_chars(String, 0) ->
 1809:     String;
 1810: skip_chars([_|String], N) ->
 1811:     skip_chars(String, N-1).
 1812: 
 1813: string_newlines([$\n|String], Line, _Column) ->
 1814:     string_newlines(String, Line+1, 1);
 1815: string_newlines([], Line, Column) ->
 1816:     {Line, Column};
 1817: string_newlines([_|String], Line, Column) ->
 1818:     string_newlines(String, Line, Column+1).
 1819: 
 1820: scan_string_with_column(String, Options0) ->
 1821:     Options = [text | Options0],
 1822:     StartLoc = {1, 1},
 1823:     {ok, Ts1, End1} = erl_scan:string(String, StartLoc, Options),
 1824:     TString = String ++ ". ",
 1825:     {ok,Ts2,End2} = scan_tokens(TString, Options, [], StartLoc),
 1826:     {ok, Ts3, End3} =
 1827:         scan_tokens_1({more, []}, TString, Options, [], StartLoc),
 1828:     {end_2,End2,End3} = {end_2,End3,End2},
 1829:     {EndLine1,EndColumn1} = End1,
 1830:     End2 = {EndLine1,EndColumn1+2},
 1831:     {ts_1,Ts2,Ts3} = {ts_1,Ts3,Ts2},
 1832:     Ts2 = Ts1 ++ [lists:last(Ts2)],
 1833: 
 1834:     %% Attributes are keylists, but have no text.
 1835:     {ok, Ts7, End7} = erl_scan:string(String, {1,1}, Options),
 1836:     {ok, Ts8, End8} = scan_tokens(TString, Options, [], {1,1}),
 1837:     {end1, End1} = {end1, End7},
 1838:     {end2, End2} = {end2, End8},
 1839:     Ts8 = Ts7 ++ [lists:last(Ts8)],
 1840:     {cons,true} = {cons,consistent_attributes([Ts1,Ts2,Ts3,Ts7,Ts8])},
 1841: 
 1842:     {Ts1, End1}.
 1843: 
 1844: scan_tokens(String, Options, Rs, Location) ->
 1845:     case erl_scan:tokens([], String, Location, Options) of
 1846:         {done, {ok,Ts,End}, ""} ->
 1847:             {ok, lists:append(lists:reverse([Ts|Rs])), End};
 1848:         {done, {ok,Ts,End}, Rest} ->
 1849:             scan_tokens(Rest, Options, [Ts|Rs], End)
 1850:     end.
 1851: 
 1852: scan_tokens_1({done, {ok,Ts,End}, ""}, "", _Options, Rs, _Location) ->
 1853:     {ok,lists:append(lists:reverse([Ts|Rs])),End};
 1854: scan_tokens_1({done, {ok,Ts,End}, Rest}, Cs, Options, Rs, _Location) ->
 1855:     scan_tokens_1({more,[]}, Rest++Cs, Options, [Ts|Rs], End);
 1856: scan_tokens_1({more, Cont}, [C | Cs], Options, Rs, Loc) ->
 1857:     R = erl_scan:tokens(Cont, [C], Loc, Options),
 1858:     scan_tokens_1(R, Cs, Options, Rs, Loc).
 1859: 
 1860: consistent_attributes([]) ->
 1861:     true;
 1862: consistent_attributes([Ts | TsL]) ->
 1863:     L = [T || T <- Ts, is_integer(element(2, T))],
 1864:     case L of
 1865:         [] ->
 1866:             TagsL = [[Tag || {Tag,_} <- defined(token_info_long(T))] ||
 1867:                         T <- Ts],
 1868:             case lists:usort(TagsL) of
 1869:                 [_] ->
 1870:                     consistent_attributes(TsL);
 1871:                 [] when Ts =:= [] ->
 1872:                     consistent_attributes(TsL);
 1873:                 _ ->
 1874:                     Ts
 1875:             end;
 1876:         Ts ->
 1877:             consistent_attributes(TsL);
 1878:         _ ->
 1879:             Ts
 1880:     end.
 1881: 
 1882: defined(L) ->
 1883:     [{T,V} || {T,V} <- L, V =/= undefined].
 1884: 
 1885: family_list(L) ->
 1886:     sofs:to_external(family(L)).
 1887: 
 1888: family(L) ->
 1889:     sofs:relation_to_family(sofs:relation(L)).
